data.prayer: Father, be a refuge and strength for the hurting in West Kameng, Arunachal Pradesh, India today.
data.verse: God is our refuge and strength, an ever-present help in trouble.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of West Kameng, Arunachal Pradesh, India
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, help your children in West Kameng, Arunachal Pradesh, India find someone like the Samaritan Woman today. Someone who will open an entire town to your message of salvation.
data.verse: So the woman left her water jar and went away into town and said to the people, 29 “Come, see a man who told me all that I ever did. Can this be the Christ?” They went out of the town and were coming to him.

data.prayer: God in Heaven, only you can and should appoint evangelists. Please, appoint and send more to West Kameng, Arunachal Pradesh, India.
data.verse: And in the church God has appointed first of all apostles, second prophets, third teachers, then workers of miracles, and those with gifts of healing, helping, administration, and various tongues.

data.prayer: Lord, you already know the names of the prophets you want to raise up in West Kameng. Please, raise them up and give them the courage to speak your truth to your church.
data.verse: Before I formed you in the womb I knew you, and before you were born I consecrated you; I appointed you a prophet to the nations.

data.prayer: Lord, you sent Jesus as a witness to testify about the light so that all the Brahmin Ganak people might believe through him.
Lord, let it be said of the 82,977 lost in West Kameng that you have called them out of darkness into your glorious light.
data.verse: But you are a chosen race, a royal priesthood, a holy nation, a people for God’s own possession, that you may proclaim the excellence of him who called you out of darkness into his marvelous light

data.prayer: Father, encourage the 923 believers in West Kameng to not just be consumers of knowledge but be producers of love, mercy, kindness, and justice.
data.verse: let us not love with words or speech but with actions and in truth.

data.prayer: God, we pray for the believers in West Kameng, Arunachal Pradesh, India that they will know how to spend an hour in prayer with you.
